attributes.action: Ban UNMARKED police cars from stopping motorists who only just break speed limit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How many times do you see flashy/expensive unmarked police cars pulling over motorists for minor driving offences?
 Dont get me wrong, unmarked cars do play a role in our society against terrorism etc. but to use them for motoring offences is a waste of our money

rejection.details:
This petiton overlaps several already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/speed-cams/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
